website_summaries.verdict: An organic option that's ideal for preventing anxiety and soothing nerves.
pros: Users love the rawness of this extract, noting immediate relief from anxiety-related symptoms
Helps skeptics see the light, so to speak, when it comes to the healing powers of hemp
cons: Does little in the way of healing muscles and other aches and pains

customer_reviews.title: Taste is good and easy to take.
customer_reviews.text: I have bin using a strong pharmacy type drug to help with back pain, only used this product for a short time but it seams to work better for a lot less money.
customer_reviews.author: LWN

customer_reviews.title: It works?
customer_reviews.text: I play golf 5 days a week and have a back ache. Since I've started using this product I find that I get looser and the pain disappears after a few holes. This didn't happen when I was only using Tylenol.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic neck pain from TMJ and I do not sleep well. The Hemp Extract helps with my pain, helps me sleep more hours, and when I wake up, I am pain free. I actually feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Hammack

customer_reviews.title: It did not work
customer_reviews.text: the product had no effect on my pain level at all. It was as if I had taken nothing at all
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: Miraculous pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: I was having horrendous back pain from arthritis. This oil wiped it out completely! It's like a miracle! I'll never be without it again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Medley

customer_reviews.title: Works better than the others I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried other CBD oils but this one is the best. Great and lite cinnamon flavor. I get more pain relief from this brand than any other brand I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Murray

customer_reviews.title: Hemp Extract
customer_reviews.text: I have used it three times since I received it and it has helped with my aching joints. So far so good! Thank you , I ran out the first time I ordered as I gave a bottle to a friend so I did purchase two more bottles. It is great at stopping my joints from aching and my shoulders no longer ache from the stress,Thank you Elaine D
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps alot with anxiety, sleeplessness and general pain.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several types of Hemp oil and this is by far the best I have used. I see relief from pain caused by arthritis and stiff joints. At night my anxiety is lessened and I sleep more soundly when using this oil. The two-pack offers a great value and the taste is very mild and not bitter at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Eckenrod

customer_reviews.title: Won't order again
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several brands and dislike the taste. I also havent noticed much if any difference taking this product.
customer_reviews.author: barkersbeauties

customer_reviews.title: Surface effects but strong tar-peppermint
customer_reviews.text: I used raw hemp oil to blend in with my dogs chocolate and also for myself. The pungent taste is a factor, my dogs fine. the effects surface more than the "3000\1000" and i feel more of a neated sch'ent and so will others. the mint to hyena problem is A okay as long as i am happy.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have so much more energy. In the past I have purchased much more expensive CDB oil and it didn't work nearly as good.
customer_reviews.author: shelia

customer_reviews.title: Immediate relief from debilitating pain in large toe .
customer_reviews.text: Suffering from joint in large toe rigid helix rigidity. Put oil on rubbed it in top of foot with tendons tear. Placed sock over foot and have 70% less pain . Can kinda walk on it too. Miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marie Guglielmo

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal with the 2pk. The Cinnamint flavor is a bit earthy with a smooth cinnamint finish. Use this for the calming effect (Anxiety) for myself & my daughter. (Don't use as a pain relief product, so I can't attest to that)
customer_reviews.author: DebH65

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. This product does nothing. It's like using the placebo.
customer_reviews.text: They did absolutely nothing for me. I paid too much for nothing. Should have sent them ALL 4 back.
customer_reviews.author: Allene L. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great pain reducer
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know how it would work, but I was greatly pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: teck1man

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this CBD oil. The taste, the packaging, the delivery ... everything is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: carolinagirl

customer_reviews.title: Topical pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I bought cbd oil a year ago. It had little impact on my sever hip pain. My pain management Dr said it improved mood, but not drasticly reduce pain. I bought cbd because I had heard of it being use topically. I rub it on my shoulder that I hurt when I fell after hip surgery. The pain relief is really impressive. It is very fast acting. It doesn't last forever, but is blessed relief for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in W.C.

customer_reviews.title: HEPLS MY GERD SYMPTOMS
customer_reviews.text: I have found this helps my GERD issues more than anything else has. I take 2 droppers a day. I used to cough and have esophageal spasms.....I no longer do! It also keeps me regular. I am on my 2nd bottle and will definitely keep using.
customer_reviews.author: Seasparkles

customer_reviews.title: Used on my arthritic feet
customer_reviews.text: a few times a day on my feet, just doing that makes them feel better. No it will not stop arthritis but it's great for using as a rubbing agent on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: suz

customer_reviews.title: I’m a believer!
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this and I’ve already noticed a reduction in foot pain and nerve pain in my hand. Would recommend it for those living with constant pain.
customer_reviews.author: roxy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take
customer_reviews.text: I like easy to swallow didn’t work fast not a bad tast.
customer_reviews.author: Pc

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice flavor to it, not a heavy oil, shipped quickly, very satisfied and will order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Santin

product_meta.title: (2-Pack) Raw Hemp Oil - 300MG - Cinnamint Flavor - Enhanced Efficacy, Made in USA - Rich in Omega 3-6-9 Fatty Acids, Kosher, Non-GMO. White Cedar Naturals
feature_bullets: SYNERGISTIC FORMULA - Our hemp is made only from the finest Colorado Grown Hemp and is extracted from the full seed. This extract is then mixed with Cold Pressed Hemp Seed Oil and Mushroom extract for enhanced bioavailability.
HEMP OIL: This Cinnamint flavored hemp oil contains 600mg per bottle, 20mg per dropper. Blended with Cold Pressed, Hemp Seed Oil for Optimal Absorption and Bioavailability
STANDARDS: GMP Certified / Gluten-Free / Kosher/ GMO-Free / Raw / Vegan / Peanut-Free / Dairy-Free / Soy-Free / Egg Free / Herbicide-Free / Pesticide-Free / Paleo approved.

VALUES: At the very foundation of our company lays our full commitment to using only the best & highest-quality ingredients to create products that contribute to a dynamic state of health. We source our ingredients responsibly, ethically, and sustainably. Always.

90-DAY SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: We want you to love our products, and for that, White Cedar offers a 90-day satisfaction guarantee. If there were any issues with the product, please write to us. We will make sure you are satisfied.
